column3: Latest;Pursat:------ People recently discovered a statues  carved on a stone wall in the central Cardamom Mountains in Kbal Domrei village
column5: Krakor district------It is believed that the site was a temple which might originally date from the Chenla period (around 4-7 century). *The Buddha images would probably have come afterwards
column6: but it isn’t yet clear.------A specialist team is being sent to go to the study site to find out the exact time that the site was used and made
column7: especially for the rock carvings.------The discovery was made on November (*or maybe December) 18
column8: 2019.------ល្អាងភ្នំ" នាគ ស" ទើបនឹងរកឃើញ?
